event.descr:
Indicates that a state change has occurred on the state attribute identified by sunPlatNotificationChangedOID. As states are enumerations of type INTEGER, the old and new states are passed in sunPlatNotificationOldInteger and sunPlatNotificationNewInteger respectively. This is as defined in X.721, sec. 13.14.

sunPlatNotificationOldInteger %parm[#6]%;
